name: Jerry's Adventure (StuntManGames)
description:
Jerry is a fox who is trying to reach home, but he has to face obstacles and enemies along the way!

Jerry also is trying to collect cherries across the forest to bring home to his son.

I am a new developer and this is my first platformer game, it is not supposed to be perfect but I tried my best and I am looking forward to making this game even better if it ends up to be enjoyable. I hope you like it.

-The Stunt Man
